title: Natural Language Understanding
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to understand my voice commands accurately so that I can easily manage my daily tasks and stay engaged without feeling monitored.

title: Voice Feedback and Confirmation
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide clear voice feedback and confirmation for my commands so that I can feel confident that my requests have been understood and executed without feeling monitored.

title: Contextual Task Management
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to use voice commands to manage my daily tasks, such as setting reminders for appointments and tracking my cycling activities, so that I can maintain my independence while ensuring I stay organized and engaged.

summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to learn and adapt to my preferences and routines over time so that I can receive personalized reminders and suggestions that keep me engaged without feeling monitored.

summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide clear error recovery and help guidance so that I can confidently navigate the system and complete my tasks without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: User Personalization Settings
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to customize my interaction preferences with ALFRED so that I can maintain my independence and feel in control while using the system.
